code: import React from'react';import{Formik,Form,Field,ErrorMessage}from'formik';import*as Yup from'yup';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OtpForm=_ref=>{let{onSuccess}=_ref;const initialValues={otp:''};const validationSchema=Yup.object({otp:Yup.string().required('OTP is required').length(4,'OTP must be 4 digits')});const handleSubmit=values=>{toast.success('OTP Verified!');setTimeout(()=>{onSuccess();},1000);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-sm mx-auto mt-10 p-6 border rounded-lg shadow-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6",children:"Enter OTP"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Formik,{initialValues:initialValues,validationSchema:validationSchema,onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block mb-1",children:"OTP"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{type:"text",name:"otp",className:"w-full border p-2 rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{name:"otp",component:"div",className:"text-red-600 text-sm"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-green-600 text-white p-2 rounded hover:bg-green-700",children:"Verify"})]})})]});};export default OtpForm;
